title: Luxury Home - ``🏡`` - AvailablE in, Denver, (CO)
posting_body: ['📧Email: Please send full contact info📧', '"Virtual and video tours available!', 'Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!', 'All you need is an internet connection."', 'Call now & schedule a tour of this apartment or simply learn more about it: \u202a\u202a', 'show contact info', '.', 'Bed(s): 2 Bath(s): 1', 'Monthly Rent: $1050 (720 sq ft)', 'Amenities:', 'On-site Laundry', 'Parking Available', 'Central AC', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood floors', 'Porch', 'Window AC', 'SPECIAL:→ Are you an active police officer, nurse, doctor or fire fighter?', 'Ask about our Good Samaritan discount!', '☏ Call', 'show contact info', 'now!', 'We want to help you find your new home!', '☏', '**NOTE**', 'If replying by email please remember to include your name, phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.', 'PLEASE CALL FOR PROMPT SERVICE:', '↬ \u202a', 'show contact info', '.', '↫', '***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and may not be pictures of actual unit.', '"Denver Real Estate practices on-going dynamic pricing for all operated units.', 'Unit promotions, discounts, and monthly rent quotes are subject to change based on day of month, current inventory, and additional market factors.', 'As such, any promotions, discounts, or monthly rent quotes are valid only at the time presented to a prospective tenant and can expire anytime thereafter."" Denver is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider."', '":', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', ':', 'Very nice home located on 1/2 acre in town.', 'It has a spacious living area with gas fireplace on remote and big dining area for family and friends.', 'More seating in kitchen around the peninsula for bar/breakfast eating.', 'Open floorplan with 3 beds and 2 baths.', 'One bath completely remodeled and one partially redone.', "It features some updated windows, 2 water heaters, basement that's dry that has cellar room, plus an extra room off back that is a fully enclosed patio for office area or playroom.", 'Neither the basement or enclosed room are included in square footage.', '2 lots make up the 1/2 acre property to give you room for a barn or just space for the kids to run and play.', 'Electrical box has been tapped and ready for generator install.', 'Super clean and move in ready.', 'More information:', 'show contact info', '.']
